text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sports Copy Desk Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Opening for a sports copy editor/designer to join the production team at our most respected and largest independent news organization, which produces a consistent APSE Top-10 daily and ... Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
